question: Duration- 20 minutesYou missed a flight due to a problem at the airport. Write a letter to the airline. In your letter:•  Say when and where the problem happened?•  Describe how you missed the flight?•  Say what you want the airline to do?Write at least 150 wordsYou do not need to write any addressesBegin your letter as followsDear….
text: My name is Simeon Agbanoma and I am one of  British Airways' prominent customers. I am writing to discuss an incident that occurred earlier this month.

I was to board a flight from London Heathrow to Dallas, the USA on 5th July  2022 at 16:00 Greenwich time with ticket number BA77706, to my greatest surprise an announcement was made at the airport that the flight has been moved 19:00PM which I waited for till the stated time.

Going forward, another annoucement was made at the aiport that the fight was cancelled  due an issue at the airport. I was furious, so I left the airport and headed back home and I intended to book another airline to fly the next day and then to my deepest suprise, I got a mail that I missed my flight and the ticket is not refundable.

I am really unhappy about the service renderred to me by your staffs and the amount stress I went through. I have been a client for over 15 years now and this is really disheartening. However, I will like to request for a refund on my flight ticket as the problem was not caused by me but by your airline and airport for suppying wrong information to passengers at that time. I would appreciate your swift response.
